Text.Page: Titus is eagerly looking for <PCNAME>. It seems that Titus found something.
You and Titus joined with Jelena on the search for Elleon. You headed for the center of Verrak Fortress.

This seems to be some tracks of Elleon.

But it stops here.

Maybe we can find other tracks if we search this garden.

(You approach the fallen naga and notice a sword wound.)

(The wound is colored in black.)

There's no doubt that Elleon killed these nagas...but what is this black aura surrounding them...

Maybe...Killian took over Elleon...

We have to find Elleon quick.

(The naga corpse is slashed brutally.)

(A black aura comes out from the wounds.)

(If Elleon did this...)

Urgh...I thought...we were helping each other...
Your friend slaughtered our people.

I was able to survive but..."Yes, I understand what happened."

He almost looked like a demon.

He seemed amused by killing us...with a black aura coming out from his face.

It's something I never want to remember again.

I need my belongings, but I can't carry them.

And we should get out of here fast.
If you got everything, we should go... north...Argh.

We're safe now.

We shouldn't lose anymore time. Go.

I'll wait for my people here.

Give this to Vogzu. It'll help you on your way to the fortress.

It's a relief to see that you're okay.

I heard that your friend Jelena is on her way. The healer tried to stop her but she wouldn't listen. That's why I sent Basheek to help her.

Speaking of, Basheek is late.

Why don't you go and find Jelena and Basheek. If you find them, meet me at the platform.

Looks like I'm nothing but trouble aren't I? Sorry. I couldn't make it to the point with all these pursuers.

I'm glad that we regrouped though. Have you found Elleon?"Yes, he is not right..."

That's what I was worried about...

We have to hurry. Elleon is battling Killian's ritual. We have to find Elleon before he's unconscious.

Let's go to Vogzu.

The platform is right ahead of us.

It's likely for the pursuers to search for us at the platform.

Vogzu and I'll go in advance to distract the pursuers.

I'll meet you at the platform.

The pursuers have gone to the fortress. They're probably after Elleon.

Please come to the platform.

Vogzu is waiting for you.

Many of us have seen your friend Elleon heading for the fortress.

Most of the draakon and naga pursuers are after him. I assume that Commander Kalligar is giving the orders.

Basheek and I will go clear the way.
Use the platform and join us when you're ready.

Basheek will be waiting for you.

Welcome. This is the island with Verrak Fortress.

The Core that you seek should be at the center of the fortress.

Vogzu is keeping an eye on the fortress to help you out.
